Tobechukwu Victor Okoh (amụrụ na 5 Disemba na afọ 1989), nke a maara dị ka Peruzzi, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Ọ malitere idekọ egwu mgbe ya na Rodney malice rụkọrọ ọrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa.Ọ bụ ezie na a na-arụrịta ụka banyere mbinye aka ya na DMW nke Davido n'oge ụfọdụ, Peruzzi bụ onye otu n'ihu nke 30 Billion Gang nke a makwaara dị ka 30BG, otu nke gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị enyi Davido dịka Blacktycoon, Tunegee, B-Red wdg. Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe e gosipụtara ya na egwu nke onye akụkọ egwu Naịjirịa bụ 2Baba na egwu a na-akpọ 'Amaka'.
Peruzzi malitere ọrụ egwu ya na Golden Boy Records na afọ a 2016, tupu ọ banye na Davido Music World na afo 2018
Peruzzi's afo 2018 single Majesty, off his Heartwork EP featured a video appearance by 2018 Big Brother Naija runner up Cee-c

Tupu ntọhapụ nke Majesty, ọtụtụ ndị na-eji mgbasa ozi ọha na eze na Naịjirịa na-ekwutọ onye na-agụ egwú ahụ bụ ndị kwuru na onye na-agụ egwú ahụ na-enwu naanị na abụ ndị a ma ama. O gosipụtara na egwu Tu-Face "Amaka".
Perruzzi bụ nwa nwanne nna Davido, Chioma.
